title: Nkechi Egbe
text: Nkechi Egbe (born 5 February 1978) is a Nigerian former <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> who played for the <a href="Nigeria%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">Nigeria women's national football team</a> at the <a href="Football%20at%20the%202004%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Women%27s%20tournament">2004 Summer Olympics</a>. At the club level, she played for <a href="Delta%20Queens">Delta Queens</a>.
